title: Keen 6 Demo versions
content:
We all know [url=http://www.spatang.com/dl.php?a=6keend&b=orig]this Special Demo Version[/url] of Keen 6 v1.0.

But I found on one of my old floppy disks [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/17885641/KEEN6.zip.html]this Promotional Release Version[/url] of Keen 6 v1.0.

The difference that I found are:
- different end screen
- the E-N-D cheat does different things
- Egagraph.ck6 and the executable are differentGroeten van Frenkel
Visit [url=http://www.sfprod.cjb.net]The Official S&F Prod. Homepage[/url]

title: Re: Keen 6 Demo versions
content:
Cool! Thanks a lot, this is interesting! Had never heard of this before..

Another difference is that the yorps have text '????' on their sign whereas in the other demo there reads 'DEMO'!3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Keen 6 Demo versions
content:
I have officially lost track of versions of everything.
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

title: Re: Keen 6 Demo versions
content:
Nice. Thanks for sharing. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: Keen 6 Demo versions
content:
Thanks a lot for making this discovery, and best of all - sharing it with us! After a fast check it seems like this version is newer than the actual demo.

One new difference:
- Pressing a key at intro brings up title screen (not menu)

title: Re: Keen 6 Demo versions
content: That would make sense actually - why would they put signs with four question marks on them, then later change the signs to read "DEMO"?  It looks like they created the demo version, then changed the signs to question marks and released it as a promo, and later on released the original one as a demo.

title: Re: Keen 6 Demo versions
content:
I found another difference: you can use the rope on the world map even if you don't actually have any rope!____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: Keen 6 Demo versions
content:
Actually if you check your inventory you'll see that you start off with the rope and grappling hook - I think the level where you collect it is unavailable in the demo, so there's no way of getting it.

(this is [url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/Keen_6_Versions]mentioned in the wiki[/url])

title: Re: Keen 6 Demo versions
content:
Hmmmn, could that be used to give the grappling hook to Keen in Kee 6 mods?
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Cute bunny!

title: Re: Keen 6 Demo versions
content:
That's what I was thinking. I guess you'd just have to disassemble them to the point where you could compare the 'new game' code.

But then of course you'd have to ask yourself why you'd bother designing a map that uses the grappling hook, and then not put it in any levels...

title: Re: Keen 6 Demo versions
content:
Well, in theory it would be a simple $01 patch for the grappling hook location, then the grappling hook could be made as -1, or to do something else.
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Cute bunny!

title: Re: Keen 6 Demo versions
content:
I'm not sure, but doesn't the hook remain in your inventory after using?
The thing keeps hanging there graphic-wise though, so perhaps there could be an invisible "powerup" in an obligatory level (a path in the the map) actually removing the hook so you need to find a second one in another level to climb even higher on the map?Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Keen 6 Demo versions
content:
Invisible powerups... my Keen4 mod uses inivisble Gnosticenes for level exits and such.

Thanks a lot for this discovery. I'm gonna study it.------------------
